config.conclusionHeadline: Your gut-hormone axis may be compromised
config.conclusionText: Menopause has fundamentally altered how you metabolize food, regulate energy, and manage stress. Your estrobolome—gut bacteria that regulates estrogen—is disrupted. You're not failing your resolutions. Your biology is sabotaging them before you start.
